channel.title: CVE Feed for HINET -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HINET -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-32959|2024-08-03T07:54:03.400Z -- hinet -- hicos%E2%80%99%20client-side%20citizen%20digital%20certificate
item.description: HiCOS’ client-side citizen digital certificate component has a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability when reading IC card due to insufficient parameter length validation for OS information. An unauthenticated physical attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, manipulate system data or terminate service.

item.title: CVE-2022-32960|2024-08-03T07:54:03.444Z -- hinet -- hicos%E2%80%99%20client-side%20citizen%20digital%20certificate
item.description: HiCOS’ client-side citizen digital certificate component has a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability when reading IC card due to insufficient parameter length validation for card number. An unauthenticated physical attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, manipulate system data or terminate service.

item.title: CVE-2022-32961|2024-08-03T07:54:03.460Z -- hinet -- hicos%E2%80%99%20client-side%20citizen%20digital%20certificate
item.description: HICOS’ client-side citizen digital certificate component has a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability when reading IC card due to insufficient parameter length validation for token information. An unauthenticated physical attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, manipulate system data or terminate service.

item.title: CVE-2022-32962|2024-08-03T07:54:03.428Z -- hinet -- hicos%E2%80%99%20client-side%20citizen%20digital%20certificate
item.description: HiCOS’ client-side citizen certificate component has a double free vulnerability. An unauthenticated physical attacker can exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code, manipulate system data or terminate service.

item.title: CVE-2022-35222|2024-08-03T09:29:17.452Z -- hinet -- hicos%20citizen%20verification%20component%20-%20stack%20buffer%20overflow
item.description: HiCOS Citizen verification component has a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability due to insufficient parameter length validation. An unauthenticated physical attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, manipulate system command or disrupt service.
